author: jbonofre
msg: [KARAF-742] Update archive release notes and download links.

author: arkurth
msg: Added optional $no_cache argument to get_image_info, get_imagerevision_info, get_imagemeta_info, get_user_info, get_computer_info.  Updated get_request_info() to use this argument when calling the subroutines to ensure current data is retrieved for the reservation.
Updated xmlrpc_call to pass the ssl_opts/verify_hostname=0 argument to the LWP::UserAgent constructor. Also changed code to call object methods rather than accessing hash elements directly.
Added check to make sure $ENV{management_node_info} is initialized before attempting to access it in notify().
Updated counters in database_select subroutine to report calling subroutine. Updated output in State.pm::DESTROY.
Updated run_ssh_command. It was not correctly detecting common SSH errors. Split up the if/else statement that checks the exit status and output.
